This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] innerHTML on a shadow root should use scoped custom element registry
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] innerHTML on a disconnected element should use the associated scoped custom element registry
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] innerHTML on a connected shadow root should use its scoped custom element
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] innerHTML on an inserted element should use the scoped custom element of the ancestor shadow root
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] innerHTML should not upgrade a custom element inside a template element
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
Harness: the test ran to completion.
